Default empty Menu:

```js
<Menu options={[]} onChange={() => {}} />
```

Default Menu:

```js
<Menu
  options={[
    { label: 'value A1', value: 'A1' },
    { label: 'value B2', value: 'B2' }
  ]}
  onChange={() => {}}
/>
```

With selected option Menu:

```js
<Menu
  selectedIdx={1}
  options={[
    { label: 'value A1', value: 'A1' },
    { label: 'value B2', value: 'B2' }
  ]}
  value="A1"
  onChange={() => {}}
/>
```

With disabled option Menu:

```js
<Menu
  options={[
    { label: 'value A1', value: 'A1', isDisabled: false },
    { label: 'value B2', value: 'B2', isDisabled: true },
    { label: 'value C3', value: 'C3', isDisabled: false }
  ]}
  onChange={() => {}}
/>
```

With long options list Menu:

```js
<Menu
  options={[
    { label: 'value A1', value: 'A1' },
    { label: 'value B2', value: 'B2', isDisabled: true },
    { label: 'value C3', value: 'C3' },
    { label: 'value D4', value: 'D4' },
    { label: 'value E5', value: 'E5' },
    { label: 'value F6', value: 'F6' },
    { label: 'value G7', value: 'G7' },
    { label: 'value H8', value: 'H8' },
    { label: 'value I9', value: 'I9' }
  ]}
  onChange={() => {}}
/>
```

With symbol keys navigation Menu:

```js
<Menu
  options={[
    { label: 'avalue A1', value: 'A1' },
    { label: 'bvalue B2', value: 'B2' },
    { label: 'cvalue C3', value: 'C3' },
    { label: 'dvalue D4', value: 'D4' },
    { label: 'avalue A5', value: 'A5' },
    { label: 'bvalue B6', value: 'B6' }
  ]}
  onChange={() => {}}
  isUsedInSelect
/>
```

With options list update Menu:

```js
const MenuWithDifferentOptions = () => {
  const [searchText, setSearchText] = React.useState(null);

  const options = [
    { label: 'value AAAA1', value: 'A1' },
    { label: 'value B2', value: 'B2' },
    { label: 'value C3', value: 'C3' },
    { label: 'value D4', value: 'D4' },
    { label: 'value E5', value: 'E5' },
    { label: 'value FA6', value: 'F6' },
    { label: 'value GA7', value: 'G7' },
    { label: 'value AAA8', value: 'A8' },
    { label: 'value I9', value: 'I9' }
  ];

  const currentOptions = searchText
    ? options.filter(option => option.label.includes(searchText))
    : options;

  return (
    <>
      <div style={{ marginBottom: '16px' }}>
        <input
          type="radio"
          name="menu-filter"
          value="empty"
          id="menu-filter-empty"
          onClick={() => setSearchText(null)}
        />
        <label htmlFor="menu-filter-empty">No filter</label>
        <input
          type="radio"
          name="menu-filter"
          value="A"
          id="menu-filter-a"
          onClick={() => setSearchText('A')}
        />
        <label htmlFor="menu-filter-a">Filter by 'A'</label>
        <input
          type="radio"
          name="menu-filter"
          value="AA"
          id="menu-filter-aa"
          onClick={() => setSearchText('AA')}
        />
        <label htmlFor="menu-filter-aa">Filter by 'AA'</label>
        <input
          type="radio"
          name="menu-filter"
          value="AAA"
          id="menu-filter-aaa"
          onClick={() => setSearchText('AAA')}
        />
        <label htmlFor="menu-filter-aaa">Filter by 'AAA'</label>
        <input
          type="radio"
          name="menu-filter"
          value="AAAA"
          id="menu-filter-aaaa"
          onClick={() => setSearchText('AAAA')}
        />
        <label htmlFor="menu-filter-aaaa">Filter by 'AAAA'</label>
        <input
          type="radio"
          name="menu-filter"
          value="AAAAA"
          id="menu-filter-aaaaa"
          onClick={() => setSearchText('AAAAA')}
        />
        <label htmlFor="menu-filter-aaaaa">Filter by 'AAAAA'</label>
      </div>
      <Menu options={currentOptions} onChange={() => {}} />
    </>
  );
};

<MenuWithDifferentOptions />;
```
